text: The Ayodhya Municipal Corporation is the governing body of the cities of Ayodhya and Faizabad in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. Ayodhya municipal corporation is located in the city of Faizabad. == Corporation election 2017 == {|class="sortable wikitable" |- !S.No. !! Party Name !! Party flag or symbol !! Number of Corporators |- | 01 || Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) || || 35 |- | 02 || Shiv Sena (SS) ||75px || 1 |- | 03 || Indian National Congress (INC) || || 2 |- | 04 || Samajwadi Party (SP) ||75px || 17 |- | 05 || Bahujan Samaj Party (BSP) || 75px || 1 |- | 06 || Independents || 75px || 4 |- |} Source ==References== Category:Faizabad Category:Municipal corporations in Uttar Pradesh Category:Ayodhya
title: Ayodhya Municipal Corporation
